readPathIRs.sql: SELECT "text" FROM (SELECT "uuid", GROUP_CONCAT("text", ' ') AS "text" FROM (SELECT "title" AS "text", "uuid" FROM (SELECT  *  FROM (bi_cloaking_text_title_dataset) WHERE ("uuid" = ?)) UNION ALL SELECT "body" AS "text", "uuid" FROM (SELECT  *  FROM (bi_cloaking_text_body_dataset) WHERE ("uuid" = ?))) GROUP BY "uuid")

writePathIRs.sql: WITH bi_new_cloaking_text_event(uuid, text) AS (VALUES (?, ?)) INSERT INTO bi_cloaking_text_title_dataset SELECT "uuid", "title", CAST((julianday('now') - 2440587.5) * 86400000 AS INTEGER) AS "__modification_timestamp_ms__" FROM (SELECT "title", "uuid" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_SEARCH("text", '<title([^<>]*?)>(?:([\s\S]*?))</title>', 2) AS "title" FROM (bi_new_cloaking_text_event)))

WITH bi_new_cloaking_text_event(uuid, text) AS (VALUES (?, ?)) INSERT INTO bi_cloaking_text_body_dataset SELECT "uuid", "body", CAST((julianday('now') - 2440587.5) * 86400000 AS INTEGER) AS "__modification_timestamp_ms__" FROM (SELECT "body", "uuid" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_REPLACE("body_text_without_other_tag", '\s+', ' ') AS "body" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_REPLACE("body_text_without_html_entity", '<([^<>]*?)>', ' ') AS "body_text_without_other_tag" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_REPLACE("body_text_without_image", '&([^<>]*?);', ' ') AS "body_text_without_html_entity" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_REPLACE("body_text_without_iframe", '<img([^<>]*?)>', ' ') AS "body_text_without_image" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_REPLACE("body_text_without_style", '<iframe([^<>]*?)>(?:([\s\S]*?))</iframe>', ' ') AS "body_text_without_iframe" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_REPLACE("body_text_without_video", '<style([^<>]*?)>(?:([\s\S]*?))</style>', ' ') AS "body_text_without_style" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_REPLACE("body_text_without_script", '<video([^<>]*?)>(?:([\s\S]*?))*</video>', ' ') AS "body_text_without_video" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_REPLACE("body_text", '<script([^<>]*?)>(?:([\s\S]*?))</script>', ' ') AS "body_text_without_script" FROM (SELECT  *, BOOST_REGEX_SEARCH("text", '<body([^<>]*?)>(.*)</body>', 2) AS "body_text" FROM (bi_new_cloaking_text_event)))))))))))
